author: Rebecca Falconer
title: Blinken says Ukraine is part of Putin's plans for a new Soviet empire
description: "Short of that, he'd like to reassert a sphere of influence around neighboring countries that were once part of the Soviet bloc," Blinken told CBS.
content:
Russian President Vladimir Putin has set his sights on other countries in addition to Ukraine, Secretary of State Antony Blinken told CBS News on Thursday evening.
